title: Pique Says Goodbye To Barca
description:
The FC crew react to Gerard Pique's final game for Barcelona after the defender announced his retirement earlier this week. Plus, Haaland's penalty at the death sends Man City to the top of the table and a late Gareth Bale equalizer helps LAFC win their first ever MLS Cup.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Pique plays his last game at Camp Nou; Haaland late penalty sees Man City go top of the table; LAFC beats Philadelphia on pens to win MLS Cup
